SageTVPlugin.Name: Adobe Photoshop Elements Catalog Viewer
SageTVPlugin.Description: Browse/view an Adobe Photoshop Elements catalog (PSE v6 and above) in SageTV. You can select photos and videos to view based on the albums and tags you create in PSE and/or by different date ranges, ratings, etc. You can then view the results as a slideshow supporting both photos and videos. Your files do not have to be imported into the SageTV database. The Photos main menu item is modified to show the PSE screen.
SageTVPlugin.Author: cncb
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: v1.1 - Albums and tags are now displayed alphabetically with "folders" (categories and sub-categories) grouped at the end like in PSE. v1.2 - Fix PSE9 file paths. Add simple Details menu screen for current slideshow file (to see file path and other details).
